overview: Milkshake! Mix brings you entertaining episodes from some of the best loved characters such as, Fifi and the Flower Tots, Mio Mao, Roary, Little Princess. Plus, introduces excellent new ground-breaking shows like, Jelly Jamm, Toby's Travelling Circus and the brilliant new CGI series, Abby's Flying Fairy School. Offering the perfect compilation mix for all boys and girls.
tagline: The perfect mix for pre-schoolers with over 2 hours of fantastic fun!
title: Milkshake! Mix
